languages.text: {n}Паскаль бросает печальный взгляд на тело Нихель. Голос его исполнен мудрости и... усталости.{/n} "Мы видели многое за эти десятилетия. Видели истинную скверну. Искажение замысла Омниссии. Кьява Гамма, Ефрат-II, планеты ушедших в небытие ксеносов... Наши собственные грехи. Тьма копится. Необходим огонь, что будет выжигать ее".

{n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль бросает печальный взгляд на тело Нихель. Голос его исполнен мудрости и... усталости.{/n} "Мы видели многое за эти десятилетия. Видели истинную скверну. Искажение замысла Омниссии. Кьява Гамма, Ефрат-II, планеты ушедших в небытие ксеносов... Наши собственные грехи. Тьма копится. Необходим огонь, что будет выжигать ее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness.{/n} "We have seen many things over these past decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma. Eufrates II. The planets of the xenos who passed into oblivion... Our own sins. The darkness is growing denser. There must be a fire that will burn it away."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは悲しげな視線をニヘルの遺体に投げかける。その声には知性と…疲労があふれている。{/n}「我々はこの数十年間でさまざまな経験をした。真の腐敗を見た。万機神の設計のディストーション。キアヴァ・ガンマ、ユーフラテス・II…忘却された異種族の星々。我々自身の罪。はびこる闇。それらを焼き尽くす炎があるに違いない」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは悲しげな視線をニヘルの遺体に投げかける。その声には知性と…疲労があふれている。{/n}「我々はこの数十年間でさまざまな経験をした。真の腐敗を見た。万機神の設計のディストーション。キアヴァ・ガンマ、ユーフラテス・II…忘却された異種族の星々。我々自身の罪。はびこる闇。それらを焼き尽くす炎があるに違いない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡悲伤地凝视着妮赫尔的尸体，声音中充满了智慧和……疲惫。{/n}“在过去的数十年里，我们看到了很多事情。我们看到了真正的腐化，以及被扭曲的欧姆尼塞亚造物。基亚瓦伽马星，欧夫拉茨二号星……还有那些化为虚无的异形行星，那些都是我们自己犯下的罪行。黑暗变得愈发浓重。必须用烈火驱逐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡悲伤地凝视着雅珀的尸体，声音中充满了智慧和……疲惫。{/n}“在过去的数十年里，我们看到了很多事情。我们看到了真正的腐化，以及被扭曲的欧姆尼塞亚造物。基亚瓦伽马星，欧夫拉茨二号星……还有那些化为虚无的异形行星，那些都是我们自己犯下的罪行。黑暗变得愈发浓重。必须用烈火驱逐。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal contemple le corps inerte de Nihel, l'air affligé.{/n} « Nous avons vu bon nombre de choses au cours des décennies, » {n}dit-il d'une voix pleine de sagesse... et de lassitude.{/n} « Nous avons vu la corruption. La déformation du dessein de l'Omnimessie. Kiava Gamma, Euphrate-II... les planètes xénos envoyées dans le néant. Nos propres crimes. Les ténèbres s'étendent. Il faut un feu capable de les dissiper. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal contemple le corps inerte de Nihel, l'air affligé.{/n} « Nous avons vu bon nombre de choses au cours des décennies, » {n}dit-il d'une voix pleine de sagesse... et de lassitude.{/n} « Nous avons vu la corruption. La déformation du dessein de l'Omnimessie. Kiava Gamma, Euphrate-II... les planètes xénos envoyées dans le néant. Nos propres péchés. Les ténèbres s'étendent. Il faut un feu capable de les dissiper. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal observa el cuerpo de Nihel con tristeza. Su voz emana sabiduría y... cansancio.{/n} «Hemos visto muchas cosas durante todos estos siglos. Hemos visto una auténtica corrupción. La deformación del diseño del Omnissiah. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... los planetas de los xenos que pasaron al olvido. Nuestros crímenes. La oscuridad apoderándose de todo. Debe haber algo para combatirla».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal observa el cuerpo de Nihel con tristeza. Su voz emana sabiduría y... cansancio.{/n} «Hemos visto muchas cosas durante todos estos siglos. Hemos visto una auténtica corrupción. La deformación del diseño del Omnissiah. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... los planetas de los xenos que pasaron al olvido. Nuestros pecados. La oscuridad apoderándose de todo. Debe haber algo para combatirla».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt Nihels Leiche traurig an. Seine Stimme ist voller Weisheit und ... Erschöpfung:{/n} "Wir haben im Lauf der Jahrzehnte viele Dinge gesehen. Wir haben wahre Verderbnis gesehen. Die Verzerrung der Pläne des Omnissiah. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II ... die Planeten von Xenos, die der Vergessenheit anheimgefallen sind. Unsere eigenen Verbrechen. Die Dunkelheit wächst. Es muss ein Feuer geben, um sie zu verbrennen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt Nihels Leiche traurig an. Seine Stimme ist voller Weisheit und ... Erschöpfung.{/n} "Wir haben im Lauf der Jahrzehnte viele Dinge gesehen. Wir haben wahre Verderbnis gesehen. Die Verzerrung der Pläne des Omnissiah. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II ... die Planeten von Xenos, die der Vergessenheit anheimgefallen sind. Unsere eigenen Sünden. Die Dunkelheit wächst. Es muss ein Feuer geben, um sie zu verbrennen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Nihel'in cesedine hüzünlü bir bakış atıyor. Sesi bilgece ve bitkin çıkıyor.{/n} "On yıllar boyunca sayısız şey gördük. Gerçek yozlaşmayı, Hermesih'in tasarımının bozunumu. Kiava Gama'yı, Eufrates II'yi... Zenoların sonsuza dek yok ettiği gezegenleri. Kendi suçlarımızı. Karanlık büyüyor. Yakıp karanlığı kovuşturabileceğimiz bir ateş olmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a sorrowful gaze at Nihel's body. His voice is full of wisdom and... weariness:{/n} "We have seen many things over the decades. We have seen true corruption. The distortion of the Omnissiah's design. Kiava Gamma, Eufrates II... the planets of xenos passed into oblivion. Our own crimes. The darkness grows. There must be a fire to burn it away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, Nihel'in cesedine hüzünlü bir bakış atıyor. Sesi bilgelik ve... Bitkinlik dolu:{/n} "On yıllar boyunca sayısız şey gördük. Gerçek yozlaşmayı gördük. Hermesih'in tasarımının bozulumunu. Kiava Gama'yı, Eufrates II'yi... Zenoların sonsuza dek yok ettiği gezegenleri. Kendi suçlarımızı. Karanlık büyüyor. Yakabileceğimiz ve karanlığı kovuşturabileceğimiz bir ateş olmalı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
